programme.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover - When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.desc: Phil's Fun Farm - When Phil learns no one on the farm thinks he's fun, he sets out to prove them all wrong... by building a crazy amusement park.

programme.desc: The Big Shine - When Grug overhears Thunk accidentally call Phil "Dad", he tries to reconnect with Thunk by taking him to the natural spectacle known as "Big Shine."

programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

However, he must lose the tail of Canada's most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she's not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep78

With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby's name.

programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1020
programme.desc: Pups Save a Capybara - The Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara when they go rolling off in a giant exercise ball.

programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. // Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. // The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.desc: Stick Time - How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Blue Mountains - Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep1

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.desc: Cubby House - Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Banana - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Banana revealing an astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, I've Got a Secret.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Grapes - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's the spectacular acrobatic grapes working together to perform the most difficult structures to perfection.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Peas and Quiet - There are odd noises in the supermarket. Supertato discovers that Evil Pea and the Mini Peas are asleep and walking through the supermarket. Supertato tries to get them back to bed.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Cereal Mountain - Chilli is determined to make it to the top of Cereal Mountain without the help of Supertato and his gadgets. Evil Pea tries to get there first by cheating.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep83
programme.desc: What's Your Name? - The Teletubbies enjoy a game of 'What's your name?' Later, there's a surprise when a bowl of Tubby Custard joins in with the game!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Carrot - Dee encourages a friend to say 'carrot' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of carrots!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Pop Wheel Trail - On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are riding around an amazing bicycle trail. But when Phoebe worries that she might fall off her new bike, will she complete the trail with her friends?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Messy Moves a Mountain - Rocky Mountain is feeling down in the dumps because he's never been to the beach, so Messy and his friends from OKIDO come up with a clever plan to cheer him up!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep45
programme.desc: TV Shop - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Wild Girls - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Stick Time - How many siblings does Norrie have? What's Duggee's favourite badge? What does everyone do on Fridays? Squirrel Club has the answers!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Blue Mountains - Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Andy and the Prairie Dog Pups - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Chihuahua, Northern Mexico to discover how a colony of black tailed prairie dogs protect their pups from prowling bull snakes, hawks and coyotes as the pups take their critical first steps above ground.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission: Transport Museum - Kika and her family are on a day out to the Woofton Transport Museum. But when their new audio guide starts malfunctioning, Kika needs her super-sight to find the curator.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Komodo and Chameleon - Steve and Aneeshwar meet the world's largest and heaviest lizard, the Komodo dragon, and lay a trail for him to find food. They also visit a chameleon who has a very long tongue.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep21
programme.desc: The Slimy Seaworm - Captain Captain discovers that someone (or something) has been eating her sandwiches and leaving a trail of yellow slime.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from, and their journey takes them from the sea and back to the kitchen sink and another drink of water. Wow! Water is amazing!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Brave Banana Badge - When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.desc: Is Offal Really Awful? [English Subtitles] (Eng Subtitles) - Welcome to a kitchen where no food gets wasted, not even wilted greens, innards or fish scales. Newbies learn how to cook with what is often binned and then compete in a zero waste cook-off.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent Ep24
programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNA's network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends..

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Inside Police Coast Guard Ep1
programme.desc: What does it mean to be responsible for law enforcement and security not only within our territorial waters but around our coastal areas and offshore islands? Our cameras following the Police Coast Guard officers to see what it takes to handle the unique challenges of a dynamic maritime environment.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: (Live) The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: Talking Point Ep21
programme.desc: How Clean Are Your Chopping Boards? - Its probably the kitchen surface your food touches most - yet you never think twice about it. Diana Ser finds out how clean our chopping boards really are.

programme.title: In Search of Heat S2 Ep1
programme.desc: From Farm To Table (Eng Subtitles) - Kevin gets inspired by a MasterChef Singapore finalist, treks through a jungle in Selangor to cook with the Orang Asli, then meets a celebrity chef who lets him have a taste of Malaccan royalty.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: From Memes To Movements
programme.desc: Born into inequality, corruption, and digital connectivity, Gen Z carry their outrage from screens to the streets. Waves of protest have shaken governments and, in some cases, toppled leaders. Can Gen Zs anger translate into lasting political change, or will their movements fade, leaving the status quo?

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the days events.

programme.title: Japan Hour Ep43
programme.desc: Gaia Series 110 : I want to protect my child's dining table (Eng Subtitles) - In Japan, child poverty is rising and many go without meals. From food banks to megabank-run cafeterias, new partnerships are forming to ensure children are not left behind.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Science View

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep20
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep1101

See their fight like never seen before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC 321: Aspinall vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC heavyweight world championship will be on the line on October 25 at Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi when Tom Aspinall defends his undisputed crown for the first time against Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 321. Englands Aspinall has ended his last three wins by knockout, including an interim title-winning effort over Sergei Pavlovich and a successful defense against Curtis Blaydes. This fall, he will face another stern test in French star Gane, a former interim champ looking to add undisputed goal to his trophy case after back-to-back wins over Serghei Spivac and Alexander Volkov
